sentences.en: And, withal, a life of privation , isolation , abnegation chastity, with never a diversion.

sentences.en: It’s hard to ignore the fact that all these tools are at root about imposing limits and narrowing options—in other words, about a voluntary abnegation of freedom.
sentences.cn: 我们很难忽视这样一个事实：所有这些手段从根本上都是关于强加限制和减少选择，关于自愿地放弃自由。

sentences.en: Men with that capacity for self - abnegation do not reach a Presidency.
sentences.cn: 具有那样 自我 克制能力的人根本当不了总统.

sentences.en: Only spontaneous love flowing with sincere generosity and self - abnegation can fertilize the soul of others.
sentences.cn: 唯有充满诚挚慷慨与 自我 放弃、油然而生的爱才能丰盛他者的灵魂.
